title: Pind Pahadi Restaurant Delhi — Full Website Build

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual theme throughout the entire website: earthy Punjabi tones (rustic brown #6B3A2A, mustard yellow #E8A020, warm red #C0392B, off-white #FAF7F2), Poppins or Inter as the primary sans-serif font, generous whitespace, and strong high-contrast CTA buttons. The overall feel should be modern-premium with an authentic Punjabi dhaba character.

quotes: White + earthy Punjabi tones (rustic brown, mustard yellow, warm red)
Authentic Punjabi dhaba vibe — but presented in a modern, premium way

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses rustic brown, mustard yellow, warm red, and off-white consistently across all pages.
Poppins or Inter font is loaded and applied site-wide.
CTA buttons are visually distinct with high contrast and hover states.
Overall aesthetic reads as modern-premium yet authentically Punjabi.

requirements.text: Build a persistent site-wide header containing: the restaurant name 'Pind Pahadi Restaurant Delhi' in English and 'पिंड पहाड़ी रेस्टोरेंट दिल्ली' in Hindi (smaller subtitle), a visible phone number (click-to-call link), and navigation links to Home, Menu, About Us, Reviews, and Contact/Book Table. On mobile the nav collapses into a hamburger menu.

quotes: Sitemap Structure: 1. Home 2. Menu 3. About Us 4. Reviews 5. Contact / Book Table

acceptanceCriteria: Header is visible on all pages.
Bilingual restaurant name (English + Hindi) is displayed in the header.
Phone number is a clickable tel: link.
All five navigation links render and route correctly.
On mobile, navigation collapses into a hamburger/drawer menu.

requirements.text: Create the Home page Hero section with: the generated hero background image (hero-bg.dim_1400x800.png) as a full-width background, the bilingual restaurant name overlaid in large text, the tagline 'Authentic Taste of Pahadi & Punjabi Flavours in Najafgarh', and three prominent CTA buttons: 'Call Now' (tel: link), 'Book a Table' (scrolls to booking form or routes to Contact page), and 'View Menu' (routes to Menu page).

quotes: Large background image of signature dishes
Tagline: "Authentic Taste of Pahadi & Punjabi Flavours in Najafgarh"
Primary Buttons: Call Now, Book a Table, View Menu

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section renders the hero background image full-width.
Bilingual restaurant name and tagline are clearly legible over the image.
All three CTA buttons are present and functional.
Call Now button opens a tel: link.
Book a Table navigates to the booking form.
View Menu navigates to the Menu page.

requirements.text: Add a 'Why Choose Us' section on the Home page displaying five icon+copy cards: '4.8 Rated by Customers', 'Authentic Pahadi & Punjabi Dishes', 'Professional & Polite Staff', 'Near Metro Gate No. 2', and 'Dine-in, Pickup & Delivery Available'. Use relevant emoji or inline SVG icons for each card.

quotes: Why Choose Us Section — Icons + Short Copy: 4.8 Rated by Customers, Authentic Pahadi & Punjabi Dishes, Professional & Polite Staff, Near Metro Gate No. 2, Dine-in, Pickup & Delivery Available

acceptanceCriteria: Five cards are displayed in a responsive grid (2 cols mobile, 3–5 cols desktop).
Each card has an icon and its corresponding copy.
Section is visually separated from the hero and next section.

requirements.text: Add a 'Featured Dishes' section on the Home page displaying five dish cards using the generated dish images: Veg Momos (veg-momos.dim_400x300.png), Veg Burger (veg-burger.dim_400x300.png), Coffee (coffee.dim_400x300.png), Punjabi Thali (punjabi-thali.dim_400x300.png), and Restaurant Ambience (ambience.dim_400x300.png). Each card shows the dish image, name, and a short one-line description. Include a 'View Full Menu' CTA button below the grid.

quotes: Veg Momos, Veg Burger, Coffee, Punjabi Thali, Restaurant ambience
CTA below section: View Full Menu

acceptanceCriteria: Five dish cards render in a responsive grid.
Each card shows the corresponding generated image, dish name, and short description.
'View Full Menu' button routes to the Menu page.
Images are loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated.

requirements.text: Add a 'Reviews' section on the Home page showing three real testimonial cards: 'Authentic food and variety of dishes.', 'Professional staff and overall great food.', and 'Friendly and warm ambience.' Display a 4.8-star rating badge and '51 Reviews' count. Include a 'Book Your Visit Today' CTA button that routes to the Contact/Book Table page.
acceptanceCriteria: Three testimonial cards are displayed with the exact quoted text.
4.8 star rating and '51 Reviews' count are visible.
'Book Your Visit Today' CTA routes to the Contact/Book Table page.

requirements.text: Add a 'Location' section on the Home page displaying: an embedded Google Maps iframe centered on 'Gate No 2, Metro Station, Nangli, Najafgarh, New Delhi, Delhi 110043', the full address text, opening hours 'Open — Closes 10 PM', price range '₹400–600 per person', a 'Get Directions' button linking to Google Maps directions URL for the address, and a 'Call Now' tel: link button.

quotes: Gate No 2, Metro Station, Nangli, Najafgarh, New Delhi, Delhi 110043

acceptanceCriteria: Google Maps iframe is embedded and displays the correct location.
Full address, hours, and price range are displayed as text.
'Get Directions' links to Google Maps directions for the address.
'Call Now' is a functional tel: link.

requirements.text: Build the Menu page with a categorized layout. Hard-code a representative set of menu items across four categories: Starters, Main Course, Beverages, and Combos. Each item shows: item name, short description, price (in ₹), and an 'Order Now' button. The page should have a category filter/tab bar at the top to switch between categories.

quotes: Menu Page Requirements — Clean categorized layout: Starters, Main Course, Beverages, Combos
Item name, Short description, Price, Order Now button

acceptanceCriteria: Four category tabs/filters render: Starters, Main Course, Beverages, Combos.
Clicking a category tab filters the visible items.
Each item card shows name, description, price in ₹, and an Order Now button.
At least 4–5 items per category are hard-coded.
Layout is responsive on mobile.

requirements.text: Build the About Us page with a section describing the restaurant's story, values (authentic Pahadi & Punjabi cuisine, family-friendly, near Najafgarh Metro Gate No. 2), and a brief team/staff highlight. Include a CTA linking to the Contact/Book Table page.
acceptanceCriteria: About Us page renders with restaurant story and values content.
Staff/team section is present.
CTA linking to the booking page is visible.

requirements.text: Build the Reviews page displaying all three real testimonials in card format (same as the homepage Reviews section), along with the 4.8-star rating, 51 reviews count, and a prominent 'Book Your Visit Today' CTA.
acceptanceCriteria: Reviews page renders all three testimonial cards.
4.8-star rating and 51 reviews count are displayed.
'Book Your Visit Today' CTA routes to the Contact/Book Table page.

requirements.text: Build the Contact / Book Table page containing: a table booking form with fields for Name, Phone Number, Number of Guests, Date, Time, and Special Request; a 'Reserve My Table' submit button; and an inline confirmation message 'Thank you! Our team will call you shortly to confirm your booking.' shown on successful submission. Also include the address, phone number (tel: link), and a Google Maps iframe on this page.

quotes: Fields: Name, Phone Number, Number of Guests, Date, Time, Special Request
Auto confirmation message: Thank you! Our team will call you shortly to confirm your booking.

acceptanceCriteria: All six form fields are present and functional.
'Reserve My Table' submit button triggers form submission.
On successful submission, the confirmation message is displayed inline.
Form data is persisted via the backend.
Address, phone (tel: link), and Google Maps iframe are visible on the page.

requirements.text: Implement a Motoko backend actor that stores table booking submissions. Expose a public function `submitBooking(name: Text, phone: Text, guests: Nat, date: Text, time: Text, specialRequest: Text) : async Bool` that stores the booking and returns true on success.
acceptanceCriteria: The submitBooking function accepts all six fields and persists them.
The function returns true on success.
Bookings are stored in a stable array or list in the actor.

requirements.text: Add a mobile sticky bottom bar (fixed to the bottom of the viewport on screens ≤768px) with three action buttons: 'Call' (tel: link), 'Directions' (Google Maps link), and 'Book Table' (routes to Contact/Book Table page). This bar must be present on all pages.

quotes: Sticky bottom bar: Call, Directions, Book Table

acceptanceCriteria: Sticky bar is visible only on mobile (≤768px).
All three buttons are present and functional.
Call button opens a tel: link.
Directions button opens Google Maps directions.
Book Table button routes to the Contact/Book Table page.
Bar is fixed at the bottom and does not overlap main content unexpectedly.

requirements.text: Add a WhatsApp floating chat button visible on all pages (bottom-right corner on desktop, above the sticky bar on mobile). The button should open a WhatsApp chat link (https://wa.me/ with the restaurant's placeholder number) in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: WhatsApp button is visible on all pages.
Button is positioned bottom-right on desktop and above sticky bar on mobile.
Clicking opens a WhatsApp wa.me link in a new tab.
Button uses the WhatsApp green color and a chat icon.

requirements.text: Add SEO meta tags to the app's HTML head: title 'Pind Pahadi Restaurant Delhi | Authentic Pahadi & Punjabi Food in Najafgarh', meta description referencing best restaurant in Najafgarh, Pahadi & Punjabi cuisine, near metro, ₹400–600. Add JSON-LD LocalBusiness schema markup with the restaurant name, address (Gate No 2, Metro Station, Nangli, Najafgarh, New Delhi, Delhi 110043), price range, and rating (4.8, 51 reviews).
acceptanceCriteria: HTML <title> and meta description tags are set as specified.
JSON-LD LocalBusiness schema block is present in the HTML head.
Schema includes name, address, priceRange, and aggregateRating fields.

constraints: Use only hard-coded menu data and testimonials on the frontend; no external CMS or third-party data APIs.
Google Maps must be embedded via iframe (no Maps JavaScript API key required).
WhatsApp link must use the wa.me format with a placeholder phone number.
All generated images must be served from frontend/public/assets/generated.
nonGoals: Online payment processing or e-commerce checkout.
User authentication or Internet Identity login.
Google Analytics or third-party click-tracking scripts.

required: Richly lit overhead spread of authentic Pahadi and Punjabi signature dishes on a rustic wooden table — warm tones, moody restaurant lighting, hero composition (hero-bg.dim_1400x800.png)
Steamed Veg Momos arranged on a dark slate plate with chutney, close-up food photography style (veg-momos.dim_400x300.png)
Fresh Veg Burger with layered fillings on a wooden board, vibrant colors, appetizing close-up (veg-burger.dim_400x300.png)
Hot cup of frothy coffee in a ceramic mug on a rustic wooden surface with warm bokeh background (coffee.dim_400x300.png)
Traditional Punjabi Thali with multiple bowls of dal, sabzi, roti, rice, and pickle on a brass thali, overhead shot (punjabi-thali.dim_400x300.png)
Warm and inviting Indian restaurant interior with earthy decor, string lights, wooden furniture, and a cozy family-dining ambience (ambience.dim_400x300.png)
